name: Santa Saunter
description:
2020 was a special year, to say the least. We all need some eggnog.

In fact, Santa has already had some eggnog. Lots of it. That's why it's such a mess outside. See all those presents in the snow? That's Santa's doing.

Let's help him collect all the presents, and make this year a little bit better for someone.

Inspired by ncannasse's ld40.

May the source be with you.
